meeting_day_two-yes.text: THE ONE HUNDRED AND TWELVE MEN AND WOMEN ABOARD THE SHEPHERD GAVE THEIR LIVES IN DEFENCE OF HUMANITY YESTERDAY
THEIR EFFORTS WERE NOT ENOUGH TO STOP THE MOON: CALAMITAS QUICKLY CORRECTED ITS COURSE AFTER BEING DIVERTED
YOU HAVE LESS THAN TWO DAYS REMAINING

meeting_day_two-no.text: THE ONE HUNDRED AND TWELVE MEN AND WOMEN ABOARD THE SHEPHERD DID NOT PERISH YESTERDAY
INSTEAD THEY WATCHED AS CALAMITAS SOARED PAST THEIR SPACECRAFT IN A STREAK OF FIERY BLUE TOWARDS THEIR PLANET
YOU HAVE LESS THAN TWO DAYS REMAINING
